document_data.name: Hallowed Temple of Selûne
document_data.ownertable: Lady [[Jasmine (priest)|Jasmine]]{{Cite dungeon/193/Shards of Selûne|2}}, as of [[1479 DR]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hallowed Temple of Selûne''' was the temple of [[Selûne]] in the city of [[Neverwinter]].
document_data.Location: The Hallowed Temple was located in the [[Blacklake District]], near the entrance to the [[River District (Neverwinter)|River District]].
document_data.Activities: As of [[1479 DR]], the Hallowed Temple was the main center of the Selûnite faith in Neverwinter.
